lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers stormed away in the second half for a 115-93 victory at home over the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Cavs Trounce Suns; James Denies He Sought Blatt’s Firing
headline.main: Cavs Trounce Suns; James Denies He Sought Blatt’s Firing

snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers stormed away in the second half for a 115-93 victory at home over the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Phoenix Suns, 115-93; other basketball scores noted.
